title: LF s5+ jungler for serious team
body:
Hey my IGN is 5YearOldGeneral and I'm currently recruiting members for a silver5 + ranked team! Please note that I will not be playing in the team, I will be a coach/ analyst.

Top: Jatman420blazeit
Jungle: 
Mid: Lost Az Fish
Adc: Tripin
Support: Cpdarkicicle
Coach/ Analyst: 5YearOldGeneral

Currently looking for a jungler!

Requirements

Must be able to work well in a team 

Must have a mic and teamspeak.

Must be willing to improve and change as a player.

Must be able to take criticism from coaches/ analysts. 

Please post your application down below 
IGN:
Role:
Rank:
Champion pool:
Availability:
Reason(s) why you want to join the team:

replies.body:
IGN: KR Advise
Role: Support/Jungle
Rank: Platinum 3
Champion pool: Elise, Lee Sin, Jarvan, Udyr, Shyvana
Availability: Whenever, just not Fridays.
Reason(s) why you want to join the team: Been playing support for my current team for a while, but Jungle is my other main so I wouldn't mind playing that in a team as well.

Hey General Just added you to my friends list on league.

Im gold 5 (nearly gold 4)   i have prior team experience but they were not as serious as i thought they would so i stopped. I have teamspeak and a mic, i am more than willing to improve and change as a player and more than willing to accept criticism.


IGN:YoutubeSchreudz
Role:Jungle
Rank:Gold 5/4
Champion pool: ( I am good with multiple champs but for jg these are mine) Rek'Sai, J4, Yi, Lee
Availability: On holidays atm till like feb and then back to school but am always on most weekdays etc might have a sporting activity one time per week but other than that im all good to play.
Reason(s) why you want to join the team: I want to get better at the game itself and get competitive for once as i believe i have the ability to grow and become a much more serious competitor and hopefully take this further.
